GSD.description:
net: ieee802154: at86rf230: Stop leaking skb's

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.11 by commit 1c72f04d52b7200bb83426a9bed378668271ea4a. For more details please see the references link.
